overview: The girls of Epsilon Chi want to go on spring break but are hopelessly broke. Failing at several jobs, they finally get help from Kelly's uncle, a private detective, who gives them some cases. But no one is prepared for how these girls operate undercover and under the covers!  Trivia: Movie was made ten years before it was released. Actress Penny Lynn said in a Feb. 2000 interview with Draculina Magazine that she just finished filming it.
title: Bikini Detectives
